name: Home Team Kit 2024
description: Official home team kit for the 2024 season. Made from lightweight, breathable fabric to keep you cool on and off the field.

name: Away Team Kit 2024
description: The official away team kit for the 2024 season, designed with durable fabric and moisture-wicking technology.

name: Team Scarf
description: Show your support with this stylish team scarf. Perfect for match days or keeping warm during winter.

name: Team Hoodie
description: Comfortable and stylish, this team hoodie is made from organic cotton and features the team's official logo.

name: Captain's Armband
description: Limited edition captain's armband with the team's colors. A perfect gift for any team fan!

name: Goalkeeper Gloves
description: Pro-level goalkeeper gloves with enhanced grip and padded protection. Available in various sizes.

name: Official Match Ball
description: Official match ball used by the team during the 2024 season. High durability and perfect for all weather conditions.

name: Team Cap
description: Stay cool and support the team with this adjustable cap, featuring an embroidered team logo.

name: Team Backpack
description: Durable and spacious team backpack, perfect for carrying your gear on match day.

name: Team Beanie
description: Keep warm during the colder months while supporting your favorite team with this beanie.
